StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateMedicalStatusWaiversNOMI]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MedicalStatusWaiverID int, @NWAID int, @SubmissionTypeID int = NULL, @DateSubmitedNOMI date.me = NULL, @DateReceivedMCRC date.me = NULL, @NOMIDisposi.onID int = NULL, @MCRCDisposi.onID int = NULL, @DateToDistrict date.me = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(30) AS
--THIS CODE CAN BE REMOVED WHEN CODE IS DEPLOYED IN MARCH 2014 --REPACE @tempDate IN UPDATE AND INSERT STATMENTS WITH getdate DECLARE @tempDate date.me SET @tempDate = getdate()
IF @tempDate < '03/19/2014 12:00:00 AM' BEGIN SET @tempDate = '03/19/2014 12:00:00 AM' END
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_NOMI] WHERE [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVER_ID] = @MedicalStatusWaiverID) BEGIN UPDATE [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_NOMI] SET [SUBMISSION_TYPE_ID] = @SubmissionTypeID, [DATE_SUBMITTED_NOMI] = @DateSubmitedNOMI, [DATE_RECEIVED_MCRC] = @DateReceivedMCRC, [NOMI_DISPOSITION_ID] = @NOMIDisposi.onID, [MCRC_DISPOSITION_ID] = @MCRCDisposi.onID, [DATE_TO_DISTRICT] = @DateToDistrict, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = @tempDate WHERE [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVER_ID] = @MedicalStatusWaiverID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_NOMI] ([NWA_ID], [SUBMISSION_TYPE_ID], [DATE_SUBMITTED_NOMI], [DATE_RECEIVED_MCRC], [NOMI_DISPOSITION_ID], [MCRC_DISPOSITION_ID], [DATE_TO_DISTRICT], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@NWAID, @SubmissionTypeID, @DateSubmitedNOMI, @DateReceivedMCRC, @NOMIDisposi.onID, @MCRCDisposi.onID, @DateToDistrict, @UserLogin, @tempDate) END
